var o = selector => String(J.select(selector).text()) ;

var book = {
	name: og('novel:book_name').replace(/(å…¨æ–‡|å°è¯´|å…è´¹é˜…è¯»|æœ€æ–°ç« èŠ‚).*|[(ï¼ˆ].*[ï¼‰)]/g, ''),
	author: og('novel:author'),
	kind: og('novel:category') + ',' + og('novel:status').replace(/ä¸­|å·²/, ''),
  wordCount: o('.layui-bg-red').replace(/\s+ä¸‡å­—/,'ä¸‡'),
	latest: og('novel:latest_chapter_name').replace(/^(æ­£æ–‡|VIPç« èŠ‚|æœ€æ–°ç« èŠ‚)?(\s+|_)|[\(ï¼ˆã€].*[æ±‚æ›´è°¢ä¹å‘æ¨].*/g, ''),
	intro: 'ã€€ã€€æœ€è¿‘æ›´æ–°:' + og('novel:update_time').replace(/(T|\s).*/, ' ').replace(/\//g, '-') + '\n' + og('description').replace(/.*(è§‚çœ‹å°è¯´|ç®€ä»‹)[:ï¼š]|å„ä½ä¹¦å‹.*/g, '').replace(/\s+/g, '\n'),
	cover: og('image'),

};
